dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5320 IH: Defense Capability Development Minor Construction Enhancement Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bacon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to modify the authority of the Secretary of Defense to carry out the defense laboratory modernization program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defense Capability Development Minor Construction Enhancement Act of 2023.

section.header: Modification of authority to carry out defense laboratory modernization program
section.text: Section 2805(g)(1) of title 10, United States Code, is amended in subparagraph (D) by inserting or development, production, and sustainment of combat capabilities before the period at the end.
